statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchases
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchases WHERE product_name = 'Shoes'
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS num_products_purchased FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_products_purchased >= 3
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_amount FROM customer_purchases
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1980-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1980-12-31' AND customer_name != 'John Doe';

SELECT customer_name, email, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(purchase_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, customers.customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT products.product_name, products.unit_price, order_items.quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT rep_name, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT rep_name, email, phone_number FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_name LIKE '%Smith%';
